greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the third smallest Pisot-Vijayaraghavan number.
link: Iain Fox, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000 (first 1000 terms from Vincenzo Librandi).
mathematica: Root[Function[x, x^5-x^4-x^3+x^2-1], 1] // RealDigits[#, 10, 90]& // First (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 20 2014 *)
program: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=solve(x=1, 2, x^5 - x^4 - x^3 + x^2 - 1); for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b228777.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Iain Fox_, Oct 23 2017
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 04 2013
